instance_template: loc("A"; "B"; "C"; "D"; "E"). edge("A", "B"). edge("A", "D"). edge("B", "C"). edge("D", "E"). time(0..6). deliver_to("C"; "E").

hard_constraints.description: Sanity check: gotta make sure the bot actually spawns at station A at the start.
No teleporting hacks. The bot can only move between spots if there's a legit path connecting them.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- at(L1, T), at(L2, T+1), not edge(L1, L2), not edge(L2, L1), time(T).

hard_constraints.description: We need to hit every delivery target exactly once; can't just skip the drop-offs.
